title: I was approved to PBE, but the link won't load.
body: Hey, I recently got an email that explained to me that I was approved for the PBE. I excitedly opened the email and clicked the link, but it just continued to load until it said "Error: 500 Somethingâ€™s gone hextechnically wrong. Maintenance golems are working to exterminate the problem." I tried opening it on other browsers, but nothing seems to be working. I'm on a Mac. Thanks.

replies.body: This error has been going around for a little bit, and it appears to be some connection or routing issue.  As a first step, I recommend [resetting your IE to default ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944#wq5)which has been the most common resolution for this.  If the issue exists, try Incognito, another browser, or another device to troubleshoot.  Let me know if that helps!
